programme.title: Out of the Cage - Nick Burnham
programme.sub-title: Out of the Cage - Nick Burnham
programme.desc: Coming from a history of drinking heavily and drug abuse, Nick Burnham was able to turn his life around completely by prioritizing his MMA training. Now, at HK38, Nick is looking to take the Lightweight title away from Dauda Keita in a fight that goes the distance!

programme.title: Out of the Cage - Todd Stoute

programme.desc: Changing your lifestyle from one of jail and rebellion to one of discipline and MMA is not an easy task, but Todd Stoute is prrof that it is possible to make that switch. At HK38, he is up against Clay Davidson and is looking for the win.

programme.title: Fight Vault - HK46 - Episode 1
programme.sub-title: Fight Vault - HK46 - Episode 1
programme.desc: Hard Knocks 46 opens with a rare treat: a ladies pro match between champions in differening disciplines, both looking to make their transition to MMA. Lindsay Garbatt is a former World Champion in Boxing while Valeria Mejia is a Pan-American Champion in Sambo. Following this is the main event of the evening, a challenge for the vacant Bantamweight title between Jesse Arnett and Dimitri Waardenburg! You do not want to miss this!
